headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Stunt Races
content: Sometimes your greatest foe in a Stunt Race isnâ€™t your co-competitors, but gravity itself. Whether you defeat a fundamental force of nature, your fellow racers, or end up in a fiery hunk of charred metal on the business end of a loop-de-loop, all players will earn 2X GTA$ and RP on all Rockstar created Stunt Races through April 28.
